headline: The Peru DugartApartment which has The Madman of the Hammer
author: La Seño María
content: Maria encountered someone early in the morning, mentioning a legendary journalist named El Sonambulo, Gary. The article discusses Renzo Galiano, a student from Colegio Sanla Mariá, who killed his best friend's sister, Alezandra Brenes, at 16 years old using a hammer.
